This fall semester, I had the delight of being a consultant for the free Berkeley statistical consulting group. My semester, I got to work with 6 wonderful statistics PhD students and 1 statistics MA student (my partner, Sargam). We were led by Professors Lisa Goldberg and Philip Stark, and Dr. Xiaowu Dai, a visiting postdoc.



- What is the research question?

- What is the experimental design?

- Have the experimental design ready before the hypothesis?

- Reviewers will ask for more statistics when it's not necessary.
